name: HMPresenceEventType
desc: The user presence type that triggers a presence event.

items.name: case everyEntry
items.desc: Triggers the event every time a user enters the home.

items.name: case everyExit
items.desc: Triggers the event every time a user leaves the home.

items.name: case firstEntry
items.desc: Triggers an event for the first user entering the home.

items.name: case lastExit
items.desc: Triggers an event when the last user leaves the home.

items.name: static var atHome: HMPresenceEventType
items.desc: Triggers the event when at least one user is in the home.

items.name: static var notAtHome: HMPresenceEventType
items.desc: Triggers the event when there are no users in the home.
